meanings.definition: Relating to or situated on the back and belly
meanings.sent1: The dorsoventral stripes on the snake's body helped it blend into the grass.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the dorsoventral markings on the fish to understand its camouflage.
meanings.sent3: The dorsoventral coloration of the caterpillar made it look like a tiny zebra.
meanings.sent4: The dorsoventral pattern on the butterfly's wings resembled a delicate painting.
meanings.sent5: The dorsoventral design on the turtle's shell was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: Moving from the back to the belly or vice versa
meanings.sent1: The dorsoventral movement of the caterpillar was slow and deliberate.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast demonstrated impressive dorsoventral flips during the routine.
meanings.sent3: The dorsoventral dance moves of the penguin entertained the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The dorsoventral shift of the seesaw made the children giggle with delight.
meanings.sent5: The dorsoventral motion of the roller coaster thrilled the riders.
